title: Eko Digital Initiative Lagos
desc: Eko Digital is a program facilitated by Lagos State Government through the office of the Special Adviser on Education - in collaboration with Advent Management Solution and LoftyInc Allied Partners Limited...

title: MSME Capacity Building
desc: Its a project sponsored by the Federal ministry of Trade and Investment to enlighten the medium scale micro entrepreneur on financial literacy, book keeping and business formation and how to get access to the Bank of Industry Loan

title: Opportunities for Africans
desc: It is the LSETF/UDADF Employability Programme for Lagos resident between the age of 18yrs - 35yrs.
